reviewtext: It is a ok unit. I do not know about putting another outside ant on it, As it is only going too be used to go 4 wheeling with, The rules say one must have a radio, Range is short about a mile, Which works for the need. I have a 29 in my Jeep, this one was a gift to my wheeling partner so not to have to mount anything. So it works I can say that.
